title: Article 1 - MISCELLANEOUS RULES
content:
Article 1 - MISCELLANEOUS RULES
State Regulations

Part 649 - NEW YORK STATE WATER POLLUTION CONTROL REVOLVING FUND REGULATIONS (§ 649.1 to 649.17)

Part 650 - Qualifications Of Operators Of Wasterwater Treatment Plants (§ 650.1 to 650.16)

Part 651 - STATE AID FOR COLLECTION, TREATMENT AND DISPOSAL OF SEWAGE-COST OF OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF SEWAGE TREATMENT PLANTS
Part 652 - Repealed

Part 653 - Approval Of Realty Subdivisions (§ 653.1 to 653.7)

Part 654 - Repealed

Part 655 - Industrial Waste Treatment Facilities: Certification For Tax Purposes (§ 655.1 to 655.6)

Part 666 - Regulation Or Administration And Management Of The Wild, Scenic And Recreational Rivers System In New York State Excepting Private Land In The Adirondack Park (§ 666.1 to 666.16 to 666.31)

Part 672 - RESERVOIR RELEASES REGULATIONS: OTHER (Subpart 672-1 to 672-6)

Part 673 - Dam Safety Regulations (§ 673.1 to 673.17)

Part 674 - Hearings Of The Water Resources Planning Council (§ 674.1 to 674.11)

Part 675 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 649 - NEW YORK STATE WATER POLLUTION CONTROL REVOLVING FUND REGULATIONS (§ 649.1 to 649.17)

Part 650 - Qualifications Of Operators Of Wasterwater Treatment Plants (§ 650.1 to 650.16)

Part 674 - Hearings Of The Water Resources Planning Council (§ 674.1 to 674.11)
